description: The Indicator of Trust provides insight about data on what can be trusted and known as a good actor. Similar to a whitelist but on steroids, reusing features one would use with Indicators of Compromise, but to filter out what is known to be good.

predicates.description: This domain is known to be good
predicates.expanded: A domain, the human name given to a host can be trusted

predicates.description: This IP is known to be good
predicates.expanded: This IP address can be trusted

predicates.description: This SHA256 Hash can be trusted
predicates.expanded: This SHA256 Hash can be trusted

predicates.description: This SHA384 Hash can be trusted
predicates.expanded: This SHA384 Hash can be trusted

predicates.description: This SHA512 Hash can be trusted
predicates.expanded: This SHA512 Hash can be trusted

entry.expanded: This attribute is likely to happen at an hourly interval
This attribute is likely to happen at a daily interval
This attribute is likely to happen at a weekly interval
This attribute is likely to happen at a monthly interval
Thie attribute is likely to happen at a yearly interval
